text:
Nikolay Timofeyevich Antoshkin (; December 19, 1942 – January 17, 2021) was a Russian Air Force colonel general and politician. He was born in Kuzminovka, Soviet Union. He was known for being in charge over the Chernobyl disaster response. He was a member of the State Duma from 2014 until his death. He was a member of the United Russia. Antoshkin was a Hero of the Soviet Union.
Antoshkin died of COVID-19 in Moscow on January 17, 2021 at the age of 78.
